subject: Boxing
lead_paragraph: The postponed light-heavyweight fight between Joe Calzaghe of Britain and the American Roy Jones Jr. will be held Nov. 8, organizers said. The Madison Square Garden bout had been scheduled for Sept. 20 but was postponed when Calzaghe injured his right hand in July. Calzaghe, 36, whose 45-0 record includes 32 knockouts, beat Bernard Hopkins on a split decision in April. Jones, 39, an eight-time world champion in four weight classes with a 52-4 record, including 38 knockouts, won a unanimous decision over Felix Trinidad in January.
